public ref class Enumerable abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一组用于查询实现 的对象的 （在 Visual Basic 中为 ）方法。

span.span: Provides a set of ( in Visual Basic) methods for querying objects that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类中的方法提供的标准查询运算符实现，用于查询数据源实现。The methods in this class provide an implementation of the standard query operators for querying data sources that implement . 标准查询运算符是常规用途方法，它们遵循[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]模式，可用于任何中的数据中表示遍历、 筛选和投影操作。基于 NET 的编程语言。The standard query operators are general purpose methods that follow the [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] pattern and enable you to express traversal, filter, and projection operations over data in any .NET-based programming language. 大多数此类中的方法被定义为扩展的扩展方法。The majority of the methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend . 这意味着它们可以调用类似于实例方法实现的任何对象。This means they can be called like an instance method on any object that implements . 枚举查询对象之前，将返回一系列值的查询中使用的方法也不会占用目标数据。Methods that are used in a query that returns a sequence of values do not consume the target data until the query object is enumerated. 这被称为延迟执行。This is known as deferred execution. 返回单一实例值的查询中使用的方法执行，并立即使用的目标数据。Methods that are used in a query that returns a singleton value execute and consume the target data immediately.

span.span: Standard Query Operators Overview

related.span: 扩展方法（C# 编程指南）

span.span: Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)
Extension Methods (Visual Basic)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法方便地通过一系列值执行计算。The method makes it simple to perform a calculation over a sequence of values. 通过调用此方法适用`func`中每个元素的一次`source`除第一个。This method works by calling `func` one time for each element in `source` except the first one. 每次`func`调用时，将传递两个元素的序列，并聚合的值 (作为第一个参数`func`)。Each time `func` is called, passes both the element from the sequence and an aggregated value (as the first argument to `func`). 第一个元素`source`用作初始的聚合值。The first element of `source` is used as the initial aggregate value. 结果`func`替换以前的聚合的值。The result of `func` replaces the previous aggregated value. 返回的最终结果`func`。 returns the final result of `func`. 此重载方法不适合所有情况下，因为它使用的第一个元素`source`作为初始的聚合值。This overload of the method isn't suitable for all cases because it uses the first element of `source` as the initial aggregate value. 如果返回值应包含的元素，则应选择另一个重载`source`满足特定条件。You should choose another overload if the return value should include only the elements of `source` that meet a certain condition. 例如，此重载不是如果你想要计算其总和中的偶数的可靠`source`。For example, this overload isn't reliable if you want to calculate the sum of the even numbers in `source`. 结果将是第一个元素是而不是甚至奇数的情况下不正确。The result will be incorrect if the first element is odd instead of even. 若要简化常见的聚合操作，标准查询运算符，还包括常规用途计数方法，以及四个数字的聚合方法，即， ， ，和。To simplify common aggregation operations, the standard query operators also include a general purpose count method, , and four numeric aggregation methods, namely , , , and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用反向字符串中的单词的顺序。The following code example demonstrates how to reverse the order of words in a string by using . [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法不返回集合中的所有元素。This method does not return all the elements of a collection. 相反，它确定集合中的所有元素是否都满足条件。Instead, it determines whether all the elements of a collection satisfy a condition. 枚举`source`可以确定结果时，就立即停止。The enumeration of `source` is stopped as soon as the result can be determined. 在 Visual Basic 查询表达式语法中，`Aggregate Into All()`子句转换为调用。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, an `Aggregate Into All()` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用以确定是否序列中的所有元素都满足条件。The following code example demonstrates how to use to determine whether all the elements in a sequence satisfy a condition. 变量`allStartWithB`为 true 如果所有宠物名称以"B"都开头或`pets`数组为空。Variable `allStartWithB` is true if all the pet names start with "B" or if the `pets` array is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不起作用而不更改的编译时类型`source`实现的类型从到本身。The method has no effect other than to change the compile-time type of `source` from a type that implements to itself. 可用于查询实现当序列实现之间选择但还具有一组不同的可用公共查询方法。 can be used to choose between query implementations when a sequence implements but also has a different set of public query methods available. 例如，给定一个泛型类`Table`，它实现和有它自己的方法，如`Where`， `Select`，并`SelectMany`，调用`Where`像调用公共`Where`方法`Table`.For example, given a generic class `Table` that implements and has its own methods such as `Where`, `Select`, and `SelectMany`, a call to `Where` would invoke the public `Where` method of `Table`. 一个`Table`表示数据库表的类型可能具有`Where`将谓词参数作为一个表达式树，并将树转换为 SQL 为远程执行的方法。A `Table` type that represents a database table could have a `Where` method that takes the predicate argument as an expression tree and converts the tree to SQL for remote execution. 如果远程执行不需要，例如谓词调用本地方法，因为方法可用于隐藏自定义方法，并改为提供的标准查询运算符。If remote execution is not desired, for example because the predicate invokes a local method, the method can be used to hide the custom methods and instead make the standard query operators available. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用隐藏了某个类型的自定义`Where`方法时所需标准查询运算符的实现。The following code example demonstrates how to use to hide a type's custom `Where` method when the standard query operator implementation is desired. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#108)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#108)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法，在非泛型集合上调用通过提供必要的类型信息的标准查询运算符。The method enables the standard query operators to be invoked on non-generic collections by supplying the necessary type information. 例如，不实现，但通过调用上对象，然后可以使用标准查询运算符以查询序列中。For example, does not implement , but by calling on the object, the standard query operators can then be used to query the sequence. 如果元素不能转换为类型`TResult`，此方法将引发。If an element cannot be converted to type `TResult`, this method throws a . 此方法的源序列是，这意味着元素具有的编译时静态类型`object`。The source sequence for this method is , which means the elements have the compile-time static type of `object`. 此方法执行的唯一类型转换为引用转换和取消装箱转换。The only type conversions that are performed by this method are reference conversions and unboxing conversions. 集合中元素的运行时类型必须匹配的目标类型，或对于值类型的元素的运行时类型必须是目标类型的装箱转换的结果。The runtime type of the elements in the collection must match the target type, or in the case of value types, the runtime type of elements must be the result of a boxing conversion of the target type. 不允许其他转换类型，例如那些之间不同的数字类型。Other conversion types, such as those between different numeric types, are not allowed. 若要获取的可转换为类型的元素`TResult`，使用方法而不是。To obtain only those elements that can be converted to type `TResult`, use the method instead of . 在查询表达式中，显式类型化的迭代变量转换为调用。In a query expression, an explicitly typed iteration variable translates to an invocation of . 此示例演示显式类型的范围变量的语法。This example shows the syntax for an explicitly typed range variable. ```csharp from int i in objects ``` ```vb From i As Integer In objects ``` 使用`select`用于执行其他转换类型，如隐式数值转换的查询子句。Use the `select` clause of a query to perform other conversion types, like the implicit numeric conversions. 下面的示例使用这两个`Cast`方法和一个`select`语句的已装箱的整数序列转换为双精度型值的序列。The following example uses both the `Cast` method and a `select` statement to convert a sequence of boxed integers to a sequence of doubles. ```csharp IEnumerable sequence = Enumerable.Range(0, 10); var doubles = from int item in sequence select (double)item; ``` ```vb Dim sequence As IEnumerable = Enumerable.Range(0, 10) Dim doubles = From item As Integer In sequence Select CType(item, Double) ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用上启用标准查询运算符的使用。The following code example demonstrates how to use to enable the use of the standard query operators on an . [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#19)]

[!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#20)] 串联两个序列的替代方法是构造一个集合，例如一个数组的序列，然后应用方法，并向其传递标识选择器函数。An alternative way of concatenating two sequences is to construct a collection, for example an array, of sequences and then apply the method, passing it the identity selector function. 下面的示例演示的这种用法。The following example demonstrates this use of . [!code-csharp[CSLINQCustomComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQCustomComparer/CS/CustomComparer.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CSLINQCustomComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQCustomComparer/VB/CustomComparer.vb#1)] 实现此比较器后，可以使用一系列`Product`中的对象方法，如以下示例所示。After you implement this comparer, you can use a sequence of `Product` objects in the method, as shown in the following example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法将返回不包含重复值的无序的序列。The method returns an unordered sequence that contains no duplicate values. 它使用默认的相等性比较器、 对值进行比较。It uses the default equality comparer, , to compare values. 在 Visual Basic 查询表达式语法中，`Distinct`子句转换为调用。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, a `Distinct` clause translates to an invocation of . 默认的相等性比较器，用于比较的类型的实现值泛型接口。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types that implement the generic interface. 若要比较的自定义数据类型，您需要实现此接口并提供您自己和方法的类型。To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own and methods for the type. 有关使用示例若要定义自定义比较器，请参阅。For an example that uses to define a custom comparer, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的整数序列中返回的非重复元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use to return distinct elements from a sequence of integers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将缓存类型的空序列`TResult`。The method caches an empty sequence of type `TResult`. 它将返回的对象是枚举，它会生成任何元素。When the object it returns is enumerated, it yields no elements. 在某些情况下，此方法可用于向用户定义的方法传递一个空序列采用。In some cases, this method is useful for passing an empty sequence to a user-defined method that takes an . 此外可用于生成方法的非特定语言元素，如。It can also be used to generate a neutral element for methods such as . 请参阅示例部分以举例说明的这种用法。See the Example section for an example of this use of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用生成一个空。The following code example demonstrates how to use to generate an empty . [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#30)] 下面的代码示例演示了可能的应用程序方法。The following code example demonstrates a possible application of the method. 方法应用于字符串数组的集合。The method is applied to a collection of string arrays. 集合中每个数组的元素添加到结果仅当该数组包含四个或多个元素。The elements of each array in the collection are added to the resulting only if that array contains four or more elements. 用于生成的种子值因为如果在集合中的任何数组不包含四个或多个元素，则返回仅空序列。 is used to generate the seed value for because if no array in the collection has four or more elements, only the empty sequence is returned. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#31)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#31)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 两个集的差集被指不会出现第二个集中的第一组成员。The set difference of two sets is defined as the members of the first set that do not appear in the second set. > [!NOTE] > 此方法返回中的这些元素`first`，但不位于`second`。This method returns those elements in `first` that do not appear in `second`. 它也不返回这些元素中的`second`，但不位于`first`。It does not also return those elements in `second` that do not appear in `first`. 默认的相等性比较器，用于比较的类型的实现值泛型接口。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types that implement the generic interface. 若要比较的自定义数据类型，您需要实现此接口并提供您自己和方法的类型。To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own and methods for the type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用仅在第一个序列中的方法来比较两个数字的序列，并返回元素的出现。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to compare two sequences of numbers and return elements that appear only in the first sequence. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#34)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#34)] 如果你想要比较的某些自定义数据类型的对象的序列，则必须实现helperclass 中的泛型接口。If you want to compare sequences of objects of some custom data type, you have to implement the generic interface in a helperclass. 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义数据类型中实现此接口，并提供和方法。The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a custom data type and provide and methods. [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#9)] 实现此接口后，可以使用的序列`ProductA`中的对象方法，如以下示例所示。After you implement this interface, you can use sequences of `ProductA` objects in the method, as shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#7)] [!code-vb[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/VB/EncapsulatedComparer.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. > [!NOTE] > 有关示例的`GroupBy`，请参阅以下主题。For examples of `GroupBy`, see the following topics. > > - > - > - 方法返回的集合对象、 一个用于遇到每个非重复键。The method returns a collection of objects, one for each distinct key that was encountered. 是，它也有其元素与关联的密钥。An is an that also has a key associated with its elements. 对象生成基于中的元素的顺序的顺序`source`生成的第一个键的每个。The objects are yielded in an order based on the order of the elements in `source` that produced the first key of each . 分组中的元素中出现的顺序生成`source`。Elements in a grouping are yielded in the order they appear in `source`. 如果`comparer`是`null`，默认相等比较器用于比较键。If `comparer` is `null`, the default equality comparer is used to compare keys. 如果两个密钥被视为相等根据`comparer`，为该分组的键选择的第一个键。If two keys are considered equal according to `comparer`, the first key is chosen as the key for that grouping. 在查询表达式语法`group by`(Visual C#) 或`Group By Into`(Visual Basic) 子句转换为调用。In query expression syntax, a `group by` (Visual C#) or `Group By Into` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . 有关详细信息和使用情况示例，请参阅[group 子句](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/group-clause.md)并[组 By 子句](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/queries/group-by-clause.md)。For more information and usage examples, see [group clause](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/group-clause.md) and [Group By Clause](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/queries/group-by-clause.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 默认的相等性比较器，用于哈希处理和比较键。The default equality comparer, , is used to hash and compare keys. 产生分层结果，这意味着从元素`outer`的匹配元素的集合与配对`inner`。 produces hierarchical results, which means that elements from `outer` are paired with collections of matching elements from `inner`. `GroupJoin` 可用于您的结果的基础的匹配项的每个元素的整个集`outer`。`GroupJoin` enables you to base your results on a whole set of matches for each element of `outer`. > [!NOTE] > 如果在没有关联的元素`inner`给定元素的`outer`，则匹配该元素的序列将为空，但仍将显示在结果中。If there are no correlated elements in `inner` for a given element of `outer`, the sequence of matches for that element will be empty but will still appear in the results. `resultSelector`函数仅调用一次为每个`outer`元素与所有的集合一起`inner`相匹配的元素`outer`元素。The `resultSelector` function is called only one time for each `outer` element together with a collection of all the `inner` elements that match the `outer` element. 这不同于方法，在对，其中包含从一个元素调用结果选择器函数`outer`和一个元素从`inner`。This differs from the method, in which the result selector function is invoked on pairs that contain one element from `outer` and one element from `inner`. `GroupJoin` 保留的元素的顺序`outer`，并为每个元素的`outer`，从匹配的元素的顺序`inner`。`GroupJoin` preserves the order of the elements of `outer`, and for each element of `outer`, the order of the matching elements from `inner`. 已在传统的关系数据库术语中没有直接等效项。 has no direct equivalent in traditional relational database terms. 但是，此方法实现了内部联接和左外部联接的超集。However, this method does implement a superset of inner joins and left outer joins. 这两个这些操作可以编写在分组联接方面。Both of these operations can be written in terms of a grouped join. 请参阅[联接运算](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107)。See [Join Operations](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107). 在查询表达式语法`join … into`(Visual C#) 或`Group Join`(Visual Basic) 子句转换为调用。In query expression syntax, a `join … into` (Visual C#) or `Group Join` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来对两个序列执行分组的联接。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a grouped join on two sequences. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. A 和 B 的两个集的交集定义为包含的同时出现在 B 中的所有元素，但没有其他元素的集合。The intersection of two sets A and B is defined as the set that contains all the elements of A that also appear in B, but no other elements. 此方法返回的对象是枚举，发生在两个序列中的显示的顺序中的非重复元素将生成`first`。When the object returned by this method is enumerated, yields distinct elements occurring in both sequences in the order in which they appear in `first`. 默认的相等性比较器，用于比较的类型的实现值泛型接口。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types that implement the generic interface. 若要比较的自定义数据类型，您需要实现此接口并提供您自己和方法的类型。To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own and methods for the type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要在每个整数的两个序列中返回显示的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use to return the elements that appear in each of two sequences of integers. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#41)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#41)] 如果你想要比较的自定义数据类型的对象的序列，则必须实现帮助程序类中的泛型接口。If you want to compare sequences of objects of a custom data type, you have to implement the generic interface in a helper class. 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义数据类型中实现此接口，并提供和方法。The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a custom data type and provide and methods. [!code-csharp[CSLINQEncapsulatedComparer#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/CsLINQEncapsulatedComparer/CS/EncapsulatedComparer.cs#9)] 实现此接口后，可以使用的序列`ProductA`中的对象方法，如以下示例所示。After you implement this interface, you can use sequences of `ProductA` objects in the method, as shown in the following example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 默认的相等性比较器，用于哈希处理和比较键。The default equality comparer, , is used to hash and compare keys. 联接是指关联的两个源的信息基于一个公共键的元素的操作。A join refers to the operation of correlating the elements of two sources of information based on a common key. 将两个信息源和依据它们相匹配的一种方法调用中的键。 brings the two information sources and the keys by which they are matched together in one method call. 这不同于使用`SelectMany`，这需要多个方法调用来执行相同的操作。This differs from the use of `SelectMany`, which requires more than one method call to perform the same operation. 保留的元素的顺序`outer`，并为每个这些元素，匹配的元素的顺序`inner`。 preserves the order of the elements of `outer`, and for each of these elements, the order of the matching elements of `inner`. 在查询表达式语法`join`(Visual C#) 或`Join`(Visual Basic) 子句转换为调用。In query expression syntax, a `join` (Visual C#) or `Join` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . 在关系数据库术语中，方法实现的内部同等联接。In relational database terms, the method implements an inner equijoin. 内部，则意味着其他序列中具有匹配项的元素都包含在结果中。'Inner' means that only elements that have a match in the other sequence are included in the results. 同等联接是一个联接中的键比较是否相等。An 'equijoin' is a join in which the keys are compared for equality. 左外部联接操作的一个已没有专用的标准查询运算符，但可以通过使用执行方法。A left outer join operation has no dedicated standard query operator, but can be performed by using the method. 请参阅[联接运算](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107)。See [Join Operations](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/442d176d-028c-4beb-8d22-407d4ef89107). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用执行内部联接的两个序列基于一个公共键。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform an inner join of two sequences based on a common key. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#45](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#45)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#45](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#45)] 值有时`default(TSource)`不是你想要使用如果集合不包含任何元素的默认值。Sometimes the value of `default(TSource)` is not the default value that you want to use if the collection contains no elements. 而不是检查不需要的默认值的结果，然后更改有必要，可以使用方法，以指定你想要在集合为空时使用的默认值。Instead of checking the result for the unwanted default value and then changing it if necessary, you can use the method to specify the default value that you want to use if the collection is empty. 然后，调用若要获取的最后一个元素。Then, call to obtain the last element. 下面的代码示例使用这两种方法来获取默认值为 1 的数字的月份日期集合是否为空。The following code example uses both techniques to obtain a default value of 1 if a collection of numeric days of the month is empty. 一个整数，默认值为 0，不对应于该月的任何一天，因为必须指定默认值为 1。Because the default value for an integer is 0, which does not correspond to any day of the month, the default value must be specified as 1 instead. 查询执行完毕后，检查第一个结果变量为不需要的默认值。The first result variable is checked for the unwanted default value after the query has finished executing. 第二个结果变量通过使用指定默认值为 1。The second result variable is obtained by using to specify a default value of 1. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法返回中的这些元素`source`，可以强制转换为类型`TResult`。The method returns only those elements in `source` that can be cast to type `TResult`. 若要改为收到一个异常，如果元素不能强制转换为类型`TResult`，使用。To instead receive an exception if an element cannot be cast to type `TResult`, use . 此方法是可以应用于集合具有非参数化类型，如的几个标准查询运算符方法之一。This method is one of the few standard query operator methods that can be applied to a collection that has a non-parameterized type, such as an . 这是因为扩展类型。This is because extends the type . 不能仅应用于所基于的集合上参数化类型，但基于非参数化的集合类型还。 cannot only be applied to collections that are based on the parameterized type, but collections that are based on the non-parameterized type also. 通过应用到一个集合，其中实现，便能够使用标准查询运算符查询集合。By applying to a collection that implements , you gain the ability to query the collection by using the standard query operators. 例如，如果指定的类型实参到将返回类型的对象`IEnumerable

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 若要按序列排序元素本身的值，请指定标识函数 (`x => x`在 Visual C# 或`Function(x) x`在 Visual Basic 中) 为`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in Visual Basic) for `keySelector`. 两种方法被定义为扩展类型，这是此方法的返回类型。Two methods are defined to extend the type , which is the return type of this method. 这两种方法，即`ThenBy`和`ThenByDescending`，使您能够指定用于对序列进行排序的其他排序条件。These two methods, namely `ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending`, enable you to specify additional sort criteria to sort a sequence. `ThenBy` 并`ThenByDescending`也会返回，这意味着任意数量的连续调用`ThenBy`或`ThenByDescending`可以进行。`ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending` also return an , which means any number of consecutive calls to `ThenBy` or `ThenByDescending` can be made. > [!NOTE] > 因为继承自，可以调用或的调用结果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 执行此操作引入了新的主排序，将忽略以前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 此方法通过使用默认比较器比较键。This method compares keys by using the default comparer . 此方法执行一个稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素的键是否相等，将保留元素的顺序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 与此相反，不稳定排序不保留具有相同键的元素的顺序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. 在查询表达式语法`orderby`(Visual C#) 或`Order By`(Visual Basic) 子句转换为调用。In query expression syntax, an `orderby` (Visual C#) or `Order By` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用序列的元素进行排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use to sort the elements of a sequence. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#70)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 若要按序列排序元素本身的值，请指定标识函数 (`x => x`在 Visual C# 或`Function(x) x`在 Visual Basic 中) 为`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in Visual Basic) for `keySelector`. 两种方法被定义为扩展类型，这是此方法的返回类型。Two methods are defined to extend the type , which is the return type of this method. 这两种方法，即`ThenBy`和`ThenByDescending`，使您能够指定用于对序列进行排序的其他排序条件。These two methods, namely `ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending`, enable you to specify additional sort criteria to sort a sequence. `ThenBy` 并`ThenByDescending`也会返回，这意味着任意数量的连续调用`ThenBy`或`ThenByDescending`可以进行。`ThenBy` and `ThenByDescending` also return an , which means any number of consecutive calls to `ThenBy` or `ThenByDescending` can be made. > [!NOTE] > 因为继承自，可以调用或的调用结果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 执行此操作引入了新的主排序，将忽略以前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 如果`comparer`是`null`，默认比较器用于比较键。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer is used to compare keys. 此方法执行一个稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素的键是否相等，将保留元素的顺序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 与此相反，不稳定排序不保留具有相同键的元素的顺序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 第一个参数`selector`表示要处理的元素。The first argument to `selector` represents the element to process. 第二个参数`selector`表示源序列中元素的从零开始的索引。The second argument to `selector` represents the zero-based index of that element in the source sequence. 如果元素的顺序已知，并且你想要使用执行某些操作特定索引处的元素为例，这很有用。This can be useful if the elements are in a known order and you want to do something with an element at a particular index, for example. 它也可如果你想要检索的一个或多个元素的索引。It can also be useful if you want to retrieve the index of one or more elements. 此方法需要的转换函数`selector`，以便生成源序列中的每个值的一个值`source`。This projection method requires the transform function, `selector`, to produce one value for each value in the source sequence, `source`. 如果`selector`返回一个值，是一组本身，负责使用者手动遍历子序列。If `selector` returns a value that is itself a collection, it is up to the consumer to traverse the subsequences manually. 在这种情况下，它可能更适合您的查询返回一系列值的单个合并。In such a situation, it might be better for your query to return a single coalesced sequence of values. 若要实现此目的，请使用方法而不是。To achieve this, use the method instead of . 尽管`SelectMany`工作原理类似于`Select`，其不同之处在于转换函数返回一个集合，然后通过扩展`SelectMany`它返回之前。Although `SelectMany` works similarly to `Select`, it differs in that the transform function returns a collection that is then expanded by `SelectMany` before it is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对一系列值进行投影，并使用每个元素的索引。The following code example demonstrates how to use to project over a sequence of values and use the index of each element. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 此方法需要的转换函数`selector`，以便生成源序列中的每个值的一个值`source`。This projection method requires the transform function, `selector`, to produce one value for each value in the source sequence, `source`. 如果`selector`返回一个值，是一组本身，负责使用者手动遍历子序列。If `selector` returns a value that is itself a collection, it is up to the consumer to traverse the subsequences manually. 在这种情况下，它可能更适合您的查询返回一系列值的单个合并。In such a situation, it might be better for your query to return a single coalesced sequence of values. 若要实现此目的，请使用方法而不是。To achieve this, use the method instead of . 尽管`SelectMany`工作原理类似于`Select`，其不同之处在于转换函数返回一个集合，然后通过扩展`SelectMany`它返回之前。Although `SelectMany` works similarly to `Select`, it differs in that the transform function returns a collection that is then expanded by `SelectMany` before it is returned. 在查询表达式语法`select`(Visual C#) 或`Select`(Visual Basic) 子句转换为调用。In query expression syntax, a `select` (Visual C#) or `Select` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用到通过一系列值的项目。The following code example demonstrates how to use to project over a sequence of values. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法枚举的输入的序列中，使用转换函数将映射到每个元素，然后枚举并生成的每个此类元素对象。The method enumerates the input sequence, uses a transform function to map each element to an , and then enumerates and yields the elements of each such object. 也就是说，每个元素的`source`，`selector`调用并返回一系列值。That is, for each element of `source`, `selector` is invoked and a sequence of values is returned. 然后将集合到一维此二维集合并将其返回。 then flattens this two-dimensional collection of collections into a one-dimensional and returns it. 例如，如果查询使用若要获取订单 (类型的`Order`) 用于在数据库中每个客户，则结果是类型`IEnumerable`C# 中或`IEnumerable(Of Order)`在 Visual Basic 中。For example, if a query uses to obtain the orders (of type `Order`) for each customer in a database, the result is of type `IEnumerable` in C# or `IEnumerable(Of Order)` in Visual Basic. 如果改为查询使用若要获取订单，订单集合的集合没有组合和结果属于类型`IEnumerable>`C# 中或`IEnumerable(Of List(Of Order))`在 Visual Basic 中。If instead the query uses to obtain the orders, the collection of collections of orders is not combined and the result is of type `IEnumerable>` in C# or `IEnumerable(Of List(Of Order))` in Visual Basic. 在查询表达式语法中，每个`from`子句 (Visual C#) 或`From`子句 (Visual Basic) 首字母后的一个转换为调用。In query expression syntax, each `from` clause (Visual C#) or `From` clause (Visual Basic) after the initial one translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用若要在数组上执行一个多投影。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a one-to-many projection over an array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法枚举的输入的序列中，使用转换函数将映射到每个元素，然后枚举并生成的每个此类元素对象。The method enumerates the input sequence, uses a transform function to map each element to an , and then enumerates and yields the elements of each such object. 也就是说，每个元素的`source`，`selector`调用并返回一系列值。That is, for each element of `source`, `selector` is invoked and a sequence of values is returned. 然后将集合到一维此二维集合并将其返回。 then flattens this two-dimensional collection of collections into a one-dimensional and returns it. 例如，如果查询使用若要获取订单 (类型的`Order`) 用于在数据库中每个客户，则结果是类型`IEnumerable`C# 中或`IEnumerable(Of Order)`在 Visual Basic 中。For example, if a query uses to obtain the orders (of type `Order`) for each customer in a database, the result is of type `IEnumerable` in C# or `IEnumerable(Of Order)` in Visual Basic. 如果改为查询使用若要获取订单，订单集合的集合没有组合和结果属于类型`IEnumerable>`C# 中或`IEnumerable(Of List(Of Order))`在 Visual Basic 中。If instead the query uses to obtain the orders, the collection of collections of orders is not combined and the result is of type `IEnumerable>` in C# or `IEnumerable(Of List(Of Order))` in Visual Basic. 第一个参数`selector`表示要处理的元素。The first argument to `selector` represents the element to process. 第二个参数`selector`表示源序列中元素的从零开始的索引。The second argument to `selector` represents the zero-based index of that element in the source sequence. 如果元素的顺序已知，并且你想要使用执行某些操作特定索引处的元素为例，这很有用。This can be useful if the elements are in a known order and you want to do something with an element at a particular index, for example. 它也可如果你想要检索的一个或多个元素的索引。It can also be useful if you want to retrieve the index of one or more elements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在数组上执行一个多投影和使用的每个外部元素的索引。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a one-to-many projection over an array and use the index of each outer element. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法时，你必须保留的元素`source`作用域中的调用后面出现的查询逻辑。The method is useful when you have to keep the elements of `source` in scope for query logic that occurs after the call to . 有关代码示例，请参见“示例”部分。See the Example section for a code example. 类型的对象之间是否存在双向关系`TSource`和类型的对象`TCollection`，即，如果类型的对象`TCollection`提供一个属性来检索`TSource`对象生成它，则不需要这样做重载的。If there is a bidirectional relationship between objects of type `TSource` and objects of type `TCollection`, that is, if an object of type `TCollection` provides a property to retrieve the `TSource` object that produced it, you do not need this overload of . 相反，可以使用并导航回`TSource`对象，通过`TCollection`对象。Instead, you can use and navigate back to the `TSource` object through the `TCollection` object. 在查询表达式语法中，每个`from`子句 (Visual C#) 或`From`子句 (Visual Basic) 首字母后的一个转换为调用。In query expression syntax, each `from` clause (Visual C#) or `From` clause (Visual Basic) after the initial one translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用若要在数组上执行一个多投影和结果选择器函数用于作用域中的最后一个调用源序列中保留每个相应元素`Select`。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a one-to-many projection over an array and use a result selector function to keep each corresponding element from the source sequence in scope for the final call to `Select`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法枚举中并行的两个源序列，并使用的默认相等比较器比较的相应元素`TSource`， 。The method enumerates the two source sequences in parallel and compares corresponding elements by using the default equality comparer for `TSource`, . 默认的相等性比较器，用于比较的类型的实现值泛型接口。The default equality comparer, , is used to compare values of the types that implement the generic interface. 若要比较的自定义数据类型，您需要实现此接口并提供您自己和方法的类型。To compare a custom data type, you need to implement this interface and provide your own and methods for the type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来确定两个序列是否相等。The following code examples demonstrate how to use to determine whether two sequences are equal. 在前两个示例中，该方法确定比较的序列是否包含对同一对象的引用。In the first two examples, the method determines whether the compared sequences contain references to the same objects. 在第三个和第四个示例中，此方法将比较序列中的对象的实际数据。In the third and fourth examples, the method compares the actual data of the objects within the sequences. 在此示例中，序列相等。In this example the sequences are equal. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#33)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#33)] 如果你想要比较的对象而不是只比较它们的引用的序列中的实际数据，则必须实现在类中的泛型接口。If you want to compare the actual data of the objects in the sequences instead of just comparing their references, you have to implement the generic interface in your class. 下面的代码示例演示如何帮助程序类中实现此接口，并提供和方法。The following code example shows how to implement this interface in a helper class and provide and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 如果`source`少于`count`元素为一个空返回。If `source` contains fewer than `count` elements, an empty is returned. 如果`count`小于或等于零的所有元素`source`生成。If `count` is less than or equal to zero, all elements of `source` are yielded. 和方法在功能上补充。The and methods are functional complements. 给定单词序列后`coll`和一个整数`n`，串联的结果`coll.Take(n)`并`coll.Skip(n)`产生相同的序列`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and an integer `n`, concatenating the results of `coll.Take(n)` and `coll.Skip(n)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在 Visual Basic 查询表达式语法中，`Skip`子句转换为调用。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, a `Skip` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用跳过指定的数量的已排序数组中的元素并返回剩余元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use to skip a specified number of elements in a sorted array and return the remaining elements. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。The method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 此方法测试的每个元素`source`通过使用`predicate`并跳过元素，如果结果为`true`。This method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and skips the element if the result is `true`. 谓词函数返回后`false`元素，该元素和中的其余元素`source`生成的其他调用并且`predicate`。After the predicate function returns `false` for an element, that element and the remaining elements in `source` are yielded and there are no more invocations of `predicate`. 如果`predicate`将返回`true`的所有元素在序列中，空返回。If `predicate` returns `true` for all elements in the sequence, an empty is returned. 和方法在功能上补充。The and methods are functional complements. 给定单词序列后`coll`和一个纯函数`p`，串联的结果`coll.TakeWhile(p)`并`coll.SkipWhile(p)`产生相同的序列`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在 Visual Basic 查询表达式语法中，`Skip While`子句转换为调用。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, a `Skip While` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要跳过数组的元素，只要条件为 true。The following code example demonstrates how to use to skip elements of an array as long as a condition is true. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#88](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#88)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#88](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#88)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法测试的每个元素`source`通过使用`predicate`并跳过元素，如果结果为`true`。The method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and skips the element if the result is `true`. 谓词函数返回后`false`元素，该元素和中的其余元素`source`生成的其他调用并且`predicate`。After the predicate function returns `false` for an element, that element and the remaining elements in `source` are yielded and there are no more invocations of `predicate`. 如果`predicate`将返回`true`的所有元素在序列中，空返回。If `predicate` returns `true` for all elements in the sequence, an empty is returned. 第一个参数`predicate`表示要测试的元素。The first argument of `predicate` represents the element to test. 第二个参数表示内的元素的从零开始索引`source`。The second argument represents the zero-based index of the element within `source`. 和方法在功能上补充。The and methods are functional complements. 给定单词序列后`coll`和一个纯函数`p`，串联的结果`coll.TakeWhile(p)`并`coll.SkipWhile(p)`产生相同的序列`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在 Visual Basic 查询表达式语法中，`Skip While`子句转换为调用。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, a `Skip While` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要跳过数组的元素，只要取决于元素的索引在条件为 true。The following code example demonstrates how to use to skip elements of an array as long as a condition that depends on the element's index is true. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 枚举`source`和生成元素，直到`count`在生成的元素或`source`不包含任何更多元素。 enumerates `source` and yields elements until `count` elements have been yielded or `source` contains no more elements. 如果`count`超出了中的元素数`source`中的所有元素`source`返回。If `count` exceeds the number of elements in `source`, all elements of `source` are returned. 如果`count`小于或等于零，`source`不是枚举和空返回。If `count` is less than or equal to zero, `source` is not enumerated and an empty is returned. 和方法在功能上补充。The and methods are functional complements. 给定单词序列后`coll`和一个整数`n`，串联的结果`coll.Take(n)`并`coll.Skip(n)`产生相同的序列`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and an integer `n`, concatenating the results of `coll.Take(n)` and `coll.Skip(n)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在 Visual Basic 查询表达式语法中，`Take`子句转换为调用。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, a `Take` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用从序列的开头返回元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use to return elements from the start of a sequence. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 方法测试的每个元素`source`通过使用`predicate`并生成该元素，如果结果为`true`。The method tests each element of `source` by using `predicate` and yields the element if the result is `true`. 谓词函数返回时，会停止枚举`false`的元素时，或者当`source`不包含任何更多元素。Enumeration stops when the predicate function returns `false` for an element or when `source` contains no more elements. 和方法在功能上补充。The and methods are functional complements. 给定单词序列后`coll`和一个纯函数`p`，串联的结果`coll.TakeWhile(p)`并`coll.SkipWhile(p)`产生相同的序列`coll`。Given a sequence `coll` and a pure function `p`, concatenating the results of `coll.TakeWhile(p)` and `coll.SkipWhile(p)` yields the same sequence as `coll`. 在 Visual Basic 查询表达式语法中，`Take While`子句转换为调用。In Visual Basic query expression syntax, a `Take While` clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用从序列的开头返回元素，只要条件为 true。The following code example demonstrates how to use to return elements from the start of a sequence as long as a condition is true. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 若要按序列排序元素本身的值，请指定标识函数 (`x => x`在 Visual C# 或`Function(x) x`在 Visual Basic 中) 为`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in Visual Basic) for `keySelector`. 并被定义为扩展类型，这也是这些方法的返回类型。 and are defined to extend the type , which is also the return type of these methods. 此设计使您可以通过应用任意数量的指定多个排序条件或方法。This design enables you to specify multiple sort criteria by applying any number of or methods. > [!NOTE] > 因为继承自，可以调用或的调用结果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 执行此操作引入了新的主排序，将忽略以前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 此方法通过使用默认比较器比较键。This method compares keys by using the default comparer . 此方法执行一个稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素的键是否相等，将保留元素的顺序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 与此相反，不稳定排序不保留具有相同键的元素的顺序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. 在查询表达式语法`orderby [first criterion], [second criterion]`(Visual C#) 或`Order By [first criterion], [second criterion]`(Visual Basic) 子句转换为调用。In query expression syntax, an `orderby [first criterion], [second criterion]` (Visual C#) or `Order By [first criterion], [second criterion]` (Visual Basic) clause translates to an invocation of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用执行次要排序序列中的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a secondary ordering of the elements in a sequence. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 若要按序列排序元素本身的值，请指定标识函数 (`x => x`在 Visual C# 或`Function(x) x`在 Visual Basic 中) 为`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in Visual Basic) for `keySelector`. 并被定义为扩展类型，这也是这些方法的返回类型。 and are defined to extend the type , which is also the return type of these methods. 此设计使您可以通过应用任意数量的指定多个排序条件或方法。This design enables you to specify multiple sort criteria by applying any number of or methods. > [!NOTE] > 因为继承自，可以调用或的调用结果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 执行此操作引入了新的主排序，将忽略以前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 如果`comparer`是`null`，默认比较器用于比较键。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer is used to compare keys. 此方法执行一个稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素的键是否相等，将保留元素的顺序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 与此相反，不稳定排序不保留具有相同键的元素的顺序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 若要按序列排序元素本身的值，请指定标识函数 (`x => x`在 Visual C# 或`Function(x) x`在 Visual Basic 中) 为`keySelector`。To order a sequence by the values of the elements themselves, specify the identity function (`x => x` in Visual C# or `Function(x) x` in Visual Basic) for `keySelector`. 并被定义为扩展类型，这也是这些方法的返回类型。 and are defined to extend the type , which is also the return type of these methods. 此设计使您可以通过应用任意数量的指定多个排序条件或方法。This design enables you to specify multiple sort criteria by applying any number of or methods. > [!NOTE] > 因为继承自，可以调用或的调用结果， ，或。Because inherits from , you can call or on the results of a call to , , or . 执行此操作引入了新的主排序，将忽略以前建立的排序。Doing this introduces a new primary ordering that ignores the previously established ordering. 如果`comparer`是`null`，默认比较器用于比较键。If `comparer` is `null`, the default comparer is used to compare keys. 此方法执行一个稳定排序;也就是说，如果两个元素的键是否相等，将保留元素的顺序。This method performs a stable sort; that is, if the keys of two elements are equal, the order of the elements is preserved. 与此相反，不稳定排序不保留具有相同键的元素的顺序。In contrast, an unstable sort does not preserve the order of elements that have the same key. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用执行次要排序序列中使用的自定义比较器降序排序的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a secondary ordering of the elements in a sequence in descending order by using a custom comparer. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Enumerable#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/CS/enumerable.cs#103)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Enumerable#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Enumerable/VB/Enumerable.vb#103)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现通过使用延迟的执行。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询及其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 该方法将合并第一个序列与第二个序列中具有相同的索引的元素，每个的元素。The method merges each element of the first sequence with an element that has the same index in the second sequence. 如果序列不具有相同的元素数，方法将合并序列，直到它达到其中之一的末尾。If the sequences do not have the same number of elements, the method merges sequences until it reaches the end of one of them. 例如，如果一个序列包含三个元素，并且另一个具有四个，结果序列必须只有三个元素。For example, if one sequence has three elements and the other one has four, the result sequence will have only three elements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来合并两个序列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to merge two sequences.
